item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 28, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. China’s most advanced nuclear submarine sank in shipyard, says US
2. Israel says it hit Hizbollah headquarters with Beirut air strike
3. Ukraine’s new infantry recruits ‘freeze’ in face of Russian onslaught
4. [Opinion] Everyone’s on Ozempic. So why will no one talk about it?
5. Trump promises quick end to Ukraine war after meeting Zelenskyy
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 28, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
